column1: External key (e.g. Matric No. or NRIC)
column2: Username  (this will also be used as default password for External Users, Internal Users must login through edventure)
column6: School or Department (must be defined first, if leave empty, "others" will be used as default)
column7: External User (set to TRUE for user without NTU account, otherwise set to FALSE)
column8: Organization (if user is exteral user, leave 'School' field blank and use 'Organization' field instead)
column12: System role (must be pre-defined, default roles are: ADMIN, INSTRUCTOR, STUDENT)
